title: T206 Green Cobb for sale...price drop
author: ullmandds

posts.post_title: T206 Green Cobb for sale...price drop
posts.post_content:
For Sale...beautiful t206 green cobby...was in an older sgc 50 holder...I have the flip somewhere...I cracked it out and was planning to resubmit it as I believe it deserves a bump.  $3300 delivered.

I am not entertaining trades for my cobb...unless it's for silver, gold...or cold hard cash!
I agree with Pete, card looks much more solid than a 4.....
Gorgeous color and registration. The top right corner might be the reason for holding it back from grading higher.
Looks like sgc got it right. Chip on The front left border plus upper right corner ding.   Nice card either way
Nicely centered on the front too....

Here is an old scan of Ty when he was incarcerated.

[URL=http://s72.photobucket.com/user/ullmandds/media/cobbsfront-2.jpg.html][IMG]http://i72.photobucket.com/albums/i176/ullmandds/cobbsfront-2.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
bring it to the nat'l pete and do the show special where you get it back 24-48 hrs.
u talkin' psa or sgc quan?

Pete,

I believe it's SGC.  That card also looks like a good candidate for the half grade system - SGC 55?

Great looking card.

Tony
thx tony...i kinda agree...but of course I would!!!!!!
